# providerConfiguration

**Instance Property**

A dictionary that contains vendor-specific key-value pairs, that you use to configure a provider.

## Declaration

```swift
var providerConfiguration: [String : Any] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The dictionary’s values must only use data types supported by [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/PropertyListSerialization]; you can’t use custom types for the values.

The manager passes this dictionary as-is to the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEAppPushProvider] when the provider starts.

## Inspecting provider properties

- **providerBundleIdentifier**: A string that contains the bundle identifier of the push provider.
